title: Land for sale in Talpe Galle
details:
72 perches land for sale in Galle-Talpe famous tourist area in land side.
40 meters to Galle Matara main road (02nd Block from the main road) & 60 meters to the Talpe Beach.
Pipe borne water service & electricity available in the land.
Solidly built 7ft parapet wall around the property.

This is a foreign friendly neighbourhood & there are many foreign owned Luxury Villas & houses in the vicinity.

Famous Unawatuna tourist area is approximately 4Km away & Galle Fort is approximately 9km away. Suitable for tourist related projects.

Genuine buyers are welcome.
